TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_bubun, title = bubun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/bubun} }

S.FORM: alang bubun ga niya mki sku Nanto Keng atu Nin'ay go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 191 buwan, 499 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 81% kyan ku 403 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 19% kyan ku 96 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 76%, Setik 1%, Bunun 1%, Amis 2%, Hla'aluwa 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal psatu tegami ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na bubun hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na bubun hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na bubun hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na bubun hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na bubun hya' ga Knaziy. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang bobon ga niya mki sko Nanto Keng ato Nin'ay go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 191 bowan, 499 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 81% kyan ko 403 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 19% kyan ko 96 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 76%, Setik 1%, Bonon 1%, Amis 2%, Hla'alowa 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ngasal psato tegami ro pqniqan iyo. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na bobon hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na bobon hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na bobon hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na bobon hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na bobon hya' ga Knaziy. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
